div.div: Heritage Community Charter School in Caldwell, Idaho is a 4 star public charter school providing classical education instruction combined with a Spanish immersion program. Created through a caring and highly qualified staff is a culture designed for student achievement. HCCS is an excellent option for grades K-8 in Caldwell, Idaho and surrounding areas including Boise, Meridian, Nampa, Notus and Middleton.

div.p: Our lottery for the 2020-2021 school year closed on March 12th. If you entered your student in the lottery, you can expect a letter via USPS the 2nd to 3rd week in April letting you know if your student was selected or, where they are currently at on the waitlist. Our lottery drawing will be held on April 4th at 9:00 a.m. at the school. It is open to the public.
If you did not enter your student in the lottery, there is still hope! Please contact our front office at 208-453-8070 to enter your student on the waitlist after April 6th!
We wish you the best of luck!

Nuestra lotería para el año escolar 2020-2021 se cerró el 12 de marzo. Si ingresó a su estudiante en la lotería, puede esperar una carta a través de USPS la 2da o 3ra semana abril. Nuestro sorteo de lotería se llevará a cabo en la escuela el 4 de abril a las 9:00 a.m.. Está abierto al público.
Si no ingresó a su estudiante en la lotería, ¡todavía hay esperanza! ¡Comuníquese con nuestra oficina al 208-453-8070 para ingresar a su estudiante en la lista de espera después del 6 de abril!
¡Les deseamos la mejor de las suertes!
